name: It's a LITTLE BIT PITCHY
description:
Hey! My name is Daniel Frost, and this is my first game. This is a 2D story based platformer game. It's nothing special and in fact, I will admit that this game is trash. I made this game just to learn how the Unity Engine works. The game obviously surrounds around Joel from Roomie Official(YouTube Channel: RoomieOfficial). So yeah, this game was intended towards his community as a contribution.

Also, you can find me at https://m.youtube.com/channel/UCRvEaby0Yd1veNjx-OFrbng
